# Tender Announcement: Senior Financial Specialist for Indigenous Services Canada

## Announcement Details
------------------------

* **Tender Title**: Senior Financial Specialist for Indigenous Services Canada
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000248031
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-12
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-27T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-07-15
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-03-31

## Background Information
-------------------------

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada - Transfer Payment Regional Corporate Services (TPRCS) unit is seeking the services of a Senior Financial Specialist to provide advisory and support services to clients, both internal and external to the Department.

The Transfer Payment Regional Corporate Services unit provides ongoing support and advisory services through the development and refinement of policies, directives, guidebooks, and other related activities, including:

* Developing new policies and directives in alignment with the Government of Canada initiatives pertaining to the New Fiscal Relationship with Indigenous communities
* Inter and intra-departmental consultations on policy-related initiatives
* Ongoing revision and refinement of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) existing policy suite pertaining to Transfer Payments and Grants and Contributions management practices

## Required Services
---------------------

The Transfer Payment Regional Corporate Services unit is looking for a Senior Financial Specialist to provide the following services:

* Develop new policies, directives, and related materials in alignment with the Government of Canada initiatives
* Provide expert advice and support on financial matters related to Transfer Payments and Grants and Contributions management practices
* Collaborate with Treasury Board Secretariat (TBS) in the redevelopment of Policy & Transfer Payments (PTP)

## Evaluation Criteria
-------------------

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Trade Agreements
-----------------

This tender is open to bidders who have completed a Trade Agreement, including:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
